participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and hardworking, with a deep love for animals and a desire to make a difference in the world.
participant_1.background: i'm from a small town. i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i was raised on a horse farm.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, enjoys family time and has a great sense of humor. Loves to try new foods and enjoys the simple pleasures of life.
participant_2.background: i live in alabama. i've one brother. i like tacos. i have three sisters. i love dogs.
